text: is a Japanese city in Fukuoka Prefecture on the island of Kyushu.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2002). "Buzen" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 96. ==Geography== The city of Buzen is on Suo Bay, on the Southeastern corner of the Suo Sea near Kitakyūshū, Fukuoka. ==Related pages== *Buzen Province ==References== ==Other websites== * Buzen City website Category:Cities in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Buzen, Fukuoka
